name: Piaf(s)
description:
Piaf(s) is a short game I made in two days for my school.

It's about dreams and memory loss ( if I remember right )

The result is ok-ish but I had fun doing it so it's alright.

You can find me here on Twitter if you have questions / want to talk to me
